Sentencas: Assessment among various groove-gasket designs under solid oxide fuel cell operating condition is presented.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The gasket is deformable under the stress applied by external loading between 0.13-0.67 MPa.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The operating temperature is from 30 to 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: It has an indicated width of 1.95 mm and depth of 2.1 mm., which is accommodated in a square, triangular and U groove channel having the dimension of 2.0 x 2.0 mm(2).
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: From the results, the U shape configuration provides the best performance with immeasurable leak rate under the applying load represented in term of global stress of 0.67 MPa.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: A stress analysis using Finite Element Method (FEM) tool, ABAQUS (TM), suggests sufficiently high compressive stress far exceeding the elastic limit with enough coverage of such high-stress area for U-shape design.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: In contrast, those from square and triangular designs posses relatively lower well-distributed stress and smaller region of highly concentrated stress, respectively.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The associated deformed cross section suggests that the gasket has plastically deformed toward the U-shape wall surface at a greater degree than those for triangular-shape design.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: It can be concluded that the greater region in deformed gasket surface can more effectively reduce interconnectivity of micro channel on the interface between the gasket and the interconnector surfaces.
Titulo: Assessment on hermetic property and mechanical compatibility of various groove-gasket sealing designs for solid oxide fuel cell stack
